sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Office Application Initiated Network Connection To Non-Local IP
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects an office application (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)  that initiate a network connection to a non-private IP addresses.
This rule aims to detect traffic similar to one seen exploited in CVE-2021-42292.
This rule will require an initial baseline and tuning that is specific to your organization.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock', SCYTHE '@scythe_io', Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{SourceIsIpv6=true; DestinationPort=53; DestinationIp=808:808:0:0:0:0:0:0; Protocol=udp; SourceIp=c0a8:21b:0:0:2841:9ddc:8ea5:ffff; DestinationIsIpv6=true; EventID=3; SourcePort=58847; Image=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office16\WINWORD.EXE; Initiated=true}

@{SourceIsIpv6=true; DestinationPort=53; Initiated=true; Protocol=udp; SourceIp=c0a8:21b:0:0:2841:9ddc:8ea5:ffff; DestinationIsIpv6=true; EventID=3; SourcePort=65002; Image=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office16\WINWORD.EXE; DestinationIp=808:808:0:0:0:0:0:0}

@{SourceIsIpv6=true; DestinationPort=53; DestinationIp=808:404:0:0:0:0:0:0; Protocol=udp; SourceIp=c0a8:21b:0:0:2841:9ddc:8ea5:ffff; DestinationIsIpv6=true; EventID=3; SourcePort=65002; Image=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office16\WINWORD.EXE; Initiated=true}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a new office macro files on the systems

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered unknown. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.
